parameters.name: CloudAssetTypes
parameters.description: The details of the cloud asset.

parameters.name: Criteria
parameters.description:
The search conditions for assets. The value of this parameter is in the JSON format and contains the following fields:

*   **name**: the name of the search condition.

*   **value**: the value of the search condition.

*   **logicalExp**: the logical relation for multiple search conditions. Valid values:

    *   **OR**: The search conditions use a logical **OR**.
    *   **AND**: The search conditions use a logical **AND**.

> You can call the [GetCloudAssetCriteria](~~GetCloudAssetCriteria~~) operation to query supported search conditions.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: LogicalExp
parameters.description:
The logical relation for multiple search conditions. Valid values:

*   **OR**: The search conditions use a logical **OR**.
*   **AND**: The search conditions use a logical **AND**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.
